school_tradition: Continental philosophy, post-structuralism, theory of discourse
main_interests: History of ideas, epistemology, ethics, political philosophy
influences: Friedrich Nietzsche, Immanuel Kant, Georges Canguilhem, Martin Heidegger, Georges Bataille, Maurice Blanchot, Søren Kierkegaard, Gaston Bachelard, Louis Althusser, Jean Hyppolite, Georges Dumézil, Raymond Roussel, Gustave Flaubert
influenced: Giorgio Agamben, Edward Said, Pierre Bourdieu, Ian Hacking, Judith Butler, Friedrich Kittler, Arnold Davidson, Gilles Deleuze, David Halperin, Donna Haraway, Hubert Dreyfus, Paul Rabinow, Jacques Rancière, Hans Sluga, Nikolas Rose, Partha Chatterjee, Antonio Negri, Michael Hardt, Félix Guattari. Richard J.F. Day.
